actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week of May 26 through June 1, 1974, as "National Stamp Collecting Week," and to proclaim May 31, 1974, as "National Stamp Collectors' Day".

summary.text: Authorizes the President to proclaim the week of May 26 through June 1, 1974, as "National Stamp Collection Week", and to proclaim May 31, 1974, as "National Stamp Collections' Day".

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week of May 26 through June 1, 1974, as "National Stamp Collecting Week," and to proclaim May 31, 1974, as "National Stamp Collectors' Day".
